messages.title: Help the Lib Dems win
messages.content: We are the strongest opposition in Northamptonshire both at County level and against the two Tory MPs at the last elections.

messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket. Vince Cable's mansion tax will mean an average £7,000 tax cut for you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Implementing Vince Cable's mansion tax to provide average £7,000 tax cut.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Strongest opposition in Northamptonshire against the two Tory MPs at the last elections.

housing.content: Vince Cable's mansion tax will mean an average £7,000 tax cut for you.
